original: You cannot move the capital to this province while at war.
translation: 你在战时无法迁都至这个省份。

original: Please wait while the host sets up the game for you. Once you got a savegame transferred to you, you can choose a country and join the game.
translation: 请等待主机为你创建游戏。当你你获取一份游戏存档后，你可以选择一个国家然后加入游戏。

original: Please wait while the host\nprepares the game for you.
translation: 请等待主机\n为你启动游戏。

original: Lobby reopened due to hotjoining players.
translation: 重开大厅以便于加入新玩家。
游戏将于 $VALUE$ 秒内恢复。

original: Hotjoining player is now entering the game.
translation: 加入的新玩家已经进入游戏。

original: The game speed has been lowered to let him/her catch up.
translation: 游戏速度已经调低以便他/她赶上进度。

original: $PLAYER|H$ is not in sync, please ask them to reconnect!
translation: $PLAYER|H$ 已经失去同步，请告知对方重新连接！

original: Are you sure you want to §RDISBAND§! $NAME$?
The used equipment will be returned to storage and the §Yunits§! will go back to the §Ymanpower pool§!. Any §Yexpeditionary forces§! will be sent home.
translation: 该单位的装备将回收至仓库，§Y军人§!将复员为§Y普通人力§!。所有§Y远征军§!将被遣散回乡。

original: Are you sure you want to §RDELETE ALL ORDERS§! from this Army?
translation: 你确定要对这个集团军§R撤销所有指令§!？

original: Are you sure you want to §RDELETE ALL ORDERS§! from this Army Group?
translation: 你确定要解除整个集团军群的§R所有指令§!吗？

original: Are you sure you want to §RDELETE§! $ORDER$ order?
§RThe unit is not located in home theater, you will lose $VALUE|%0$ of its equipment!§!
translation: §R该单位不在本土战区，将会损失$VALUE|%0$的装备！§!

original: §R$NUM$ units are not located in home theater, you will lose $VALUE|%0$ of their equipment!§!
translation: §R$NUM$ 的单位不在本土战区，将会损失 $VALUE|%0$的装备！§!

original: §RThe unit is encircled, you will lose all of its equipment and $VALUE|%0$ of its manpower!§!
translation: §R该单位被包围，将会失去所有装备和 $VALUE|%0$ 的人员!§!

original: §R$NUM$ units are encircled, you will lose all of their equipment and $VALUE|%0$ of their manpower!§!
translation: §R$NUM$ 部队被包围，将会失去所有装备和 $VALUE|%0$ 的人员!§!

original: After the unit assignment $TO_REMOVE|R$ will be §Rdisbanded§!.\n\nAre you sure you want to §YREASSIGN§! all units to $ARMY|H$?
translation: 在重新分配之后$TO_REMOVE|R$将会被§R解散§!。\n\n你确定要§Y重新分配§!所有单位到$ARMY|H$？

original: §RCannot unassign units from the Border War!§!
translation: §R不能取消分配进行边界冲突的单位！§!

original: Are you sure you want to UNASSIGN $NAME|H$?
All §GArmies§! that won't have any §YDivisions§! will be automatically §RRemoved§! and all orders will be §RLost§!!
translation: 所有没有§Y师§!的§G集团军§!将会被自动§R解散§!，所有指令都会§R丢失§!!

original: All §YArmies§! that won't have any §YDivisions§! will be automaticly §RRemoved§! and all orders will be §RLost§!!\n\nAre you sure you want to §YREASSIGN§! all units to other §YArmy§!?
translation: 所有没有§Y师§!的§Y集团军§!将会被自动§R解散§!，所有指令都会§R丢失§!!\n\n你确定要把所有单位§Y重新编入§!另一个§Y集团军§!？

original: All units from this Army will become unassigned, and all painted orders will be deleted.\nAre you sure you want to §RRemove§! the §RArmy§!?
translation: 这个集团军的所有的单位都会变成未分配状态，计划的指令也会被撤销。\n你确定要§R解散§!这个§R集团军§!？

original: All units belonging to sub-armies will be unassigned and all painted orders will be deleted.\nAre you sure you want to §RRemove§! the §RArmy Group§!?
translation: 所有指令都会被移除，下属集团军的所有部队将全部变为未分配状态。\n你确定要§R解散§!这个§R集团军群§!？

original: $NAME|H$ is already assigned to another §GArmy§! and will be reassigned.\nAre you sure you want to §RReassign§! the §GCommander§!?
translation: $NAME|H$ 已经被分配到另一个§G集团军§!并且将被重新分配。\n你确定要§R重新分配§!这名§G指挥官§!？

original: $NAME|H$ is already assigned to another §GArmy§! that has been sent as a §Yvolunteers§!.\nAre you sure you want to §RReassign§! the §GCommander§!?
translation: $NAME|H$已经被分配到了作为§Y志愿军§!远征的§G集团军§!中。\n你确定要§R重新分配§!这名§G指挥官§!？

original: $NAME|H$ is already assigned to another §GFleet§! and will be reassigned.\nAre you sure you want to §RReassign§! the §GCommander§!?
translation: $NAME|H$ 已经被重新分配给另一只§G舰队§! 。\n你确定要§R重新分配§!这名§G指挥官§!？

original: Are you sure you want to §YCHANGE§! the §YDivision Template§! to $TEMPLATE|H$ for this §YUnit§!? It may take a while for the new equipment to arrive.
translation: 你确定要把这个§Y单位§!的§Y师编制§!§Y变成§!$TEMPLATE|H$？这可能需要一段时间才能让新装备到达并更换完毕。

original: Are you sure you want to §YCHANGE§! the §YDivision Template§! to $TEMPLATE|H$ for these $COUNT|Y$ §YUnits§!? It may take a while for the new equipment to arrive.
translation: 你确定要把这$COUNT|Y$个§Y单位§!的§Y师编制§!§Y变成§!$TEMPLATE|H$？这可能需要一段时间才能让新装备到达并更换完毕。

original: $NAME$ has been installed, you should restart EU4.
There is $NUM|H$ available DLCs awaiting your attention.
translation: 有 $NUM|H$ 可用的DLC等待你的关注。

original: No music playing at the moment.
Game will boot up in $MIN$ minutes.
Game will start as soon as all players are ready.
translation: 游戏将在所有玩家都准备好后开始。

original: In Ironman mode, console cheats are disabled and the game is automatically saved regularly to a single file. In games played with this setting, there is no turning back.
translation: 在铁人模式，控制台作弊被禁用，游戏会被自动定时保存到单个文件中。在游戏中使用此设置出场，将没有回头路可走。

original: AI countries will, where applicable, pick §HNational Focuses§! in a historical order. Select this if you want other countries to follow their historical paths more closely.
translation: 如果你希望其他国家重现它们的历史方向请选择此项。AI国家将按照历史顺序选择可行的§H国策§!。

original: Insufficient Intel to provide Unit details
translation: 没有足够的情报提供单位详细资料

original: Insufficient Intel to provide Fleet details
translation: 没有足够的资料提供舰队详细资料

original: Option allowed only in multiplayer session.
translation: 只能在多人游戏中的选项。

original: In this window you can toggle the AI behavior of your country when you leave the multiplayer session.\nThe settings are stored in the save file, so if the other players continue the game without you, the AI will control your country according to these settings.
translation: 当你离开多人游戏在此窗口中可以切换你的国家的AI行为。\n该设置存储在保存文件，因此，如果其他玩家在没有你的情况下继续游戏，AI会根据这些设置控制你的国家。

original: Controls if the AI may start wars
Controls if the AI will keep your current alliances and honor Call to Arms requests
translation: 控制AI是否会维持当前的同盟并响应战斗请求

original: Controls if the AI will try to make peace as soon as possible in wars
translation: 控制AI是否会尝试在战争中尽快和平

original: Controls if the AI may move Merchants to other Nodes
translation: 控制AI是否可以移动商人到其他节点上

original: §YSave game belongs to another user or is edited. Achievements will be disabled.§!
translation: §Y游戏存档属于另一个用户或者被修改过，成就将被禁用。§!

original: §YEU4 is running a mod or is altered in other means. Achievements will be disabled.§!
translation: §YHOI4运行了一个MOD或者其他非原版改变，成就将被禁用。§!

original: §YThis game is meant to be played as $COUNTRY$. Achievements will be disabled.§!
translation: §Y这场游戏是用 $COUNTRY$ 进行的。成就将被禁用。§!

original: §RThis save is from another version of the game and cannot be loaded.§!
translation: §R这个存档来自游戏其他版本，无法载入。§!

original: §RThis save is from another version of the game and may behave unpredictably when loaded.§!
translation: §R这个存档是在另一个游戏版本下保存的，读取该存档可能会使游戏发生未知问题。§!

original: Are you sure you want to remove $NAME|H$ from cloud?
Select game(s) to remove from cloud.\nFile(s) will not be removed from local computer.
translation: 选择要从云端删除的游戏。\n存于本机内的档案不会被移除。

original: By submitting this item, you agree to the workshop terms of service.
translation: 提交本物品即同意工作坊之服务条款。

original: Ironman is not available in multiplayer.
translation: 多人游戏不能开启铁人模式。

original: Ironman needs Steam Cloud enabled and user to be logged on to Steam.
translation: 铁人模式需要与Steam云端服务器连接，并登入Steam。

original: Are you sure you wish to load save game $NAME$ and abort your current game?
translation: 是否确认载入游戏$NAME$？此举将中止当前游戏。

original: Can't build in a province under siege.
translation: 当省份遭围攻时不能建设。

original: $WHO|H$ paused the game. The game will be paused for another $SEC|0Y$ seconds unless $WHO|Y$ or the host unpauses.
translation: $WHO|H$ 暂停游戏。游戏会暂停 $SEC|0Y$ 秒，直至 $WHO|Y$ 或主机解除暂停。
§R只有铁人模式才能完成成就！§!

original: There are no dismissed active alerts
translation: 并无已撤去之有效警示

original: Continue Game, no further score will be recorded from this point onward
translation: 游戏继续，但从现时起将不会计算分数
陆军分数：$ARMY$\n海军分数：$NAVY$\n空军分数：$AIR$

original: Number of Civilian Factories: $NUM_CIV$\nNumber of Military Factories: $NUM_MIL$\nNumber of Naval Factories: $NUM_NAVAL$
translation: 民用工厂数量：$NUM_CIV$\n军用工厂数量：$NUM_MIL$\n海军工厂数量：$NUM_NAVAL$

original: §RCannot create airwing in the volunteer airbase§!
translation: §R不能在志愿军空军基地创建空军联队§!

original: This chunk is supported via §YAir Supply§!.\nSupplies dropped: $VAL|+=$
translation: 这部分由§Y空中补给§!供给。\n空投下的补给：$VAL|+=$

§Y需求§!：$REQ$
  §Y陆军§!：$REQ_ARMY$ ( 己方：$REQ_OUR_ARMY|Y$，同盟：$REQ_ALLIED_ARMY|Y$ )
  §Y海军§!：$REQ_NAVY$
  §Y空军§!：$REQ_AIR$

§Y支援§!：$SUP$

original: Order ships to patrol a selected region.
translation: 命令舰艇在指定海域巡逻。

original: Order the fleet to actively seek out and engage enemy fleets in the selected region(s).
translation: 命令舰艇在指定海域主动搜索与敌人交战。

original: Order the fleet to raid enemy convoys in the selected region(s).
translation: 命令舰艇在指定海域袭击运输船。

original: Order the fleet to escort convoys in selected region(s) and protect them against enemy raids.
translation: 命令舰艇在指定海域护卫运输船以对抗敌人的袭击。

original: Order a fleet to actively support troop transport and invasions in the selected §YInvasion orders§!.\n§GClick§! to enable this mission, then §GClick§! on the invasion arrow if you have drawn one.
translation: 命令舰艇主动支援部队运输和被选择的§Y登陆命令§!中的登陆行动。\n§G点击§!激活这个任务，然后§G点击§!登陆箭头（如果你画了一个）。

original: Order ships to move to a selected sea province. Note that this will cancel any existing mission.\n\nCapital Ships placed on Hold in a sea province neighboring a land battle will be able to help out with §HShore Bombardment§!.
translation: 命令舰艇移动到指定海域。注意这将取消任何现有任务。\n\n在邻接陆地的海域待机的主力舰可以用§H对岸炮击§!支援邻接陆地上的战斗。

original: §GRight-click§! on the map to §Hmove§! to the province.\nIf the navy has pending mission, it will be temporarily deactivated.\nUnit will proceed when formation is gathered.
translation: §G右键点击§!地图以§H移动§!到该省份。\n如果这只舰队有等待执行的任务，这会暂时解除这个任务。\n单位会在组好阵型后前进。

original: Toggle Order §HActive§! status.\nTo activate it, you must first assign one or more §Yregions§! and at least one §YOrder§!.
translation: 改变命令的§H激活§!状态。\n激活前你必须指定至少一个§Y海域§!和至少一个§Y命令§!。

original:
Click on the map:
§GRight-click§! to §Yadd§!, or §YSHIFT§!+§GRight-click§! to §Yremove§! regions.
Regions must be neighboring each other.
§GRight-click§! on this button to §Rclear all regions§!.
translation:
点击地图：
§G右键点击§!§Y增加§!，或者§YSHIFT§!+§G右键点击§!§Y去除§!海域。
海域必须相邻。
§G右键点击§!这个按钮§R清除所有海域§!。

original: Create a new fleet with ships from this fleet
translation: 用这支舰队中的舰只创建新的舰队

original: The fleet will always engage the enemy. Moving through the province with spotted enemy or pending battle will make the fleet to engage.
translation: 舰队总是与敌人交战。穿过已经发现敌人或正在交战的省份将使舰队开始战斗。

original: The fleet will try to avoid engaging the enemy so it can move through the provinces including enemy ships and battles.\nUnless... we are spotted and the enemy shoot first.
translation: 舰队将避免与敌人交战，这样就可以穿越正在有敌人存在或是正在发生战斗的省份。\n除非……我们被发现了而且敌人率先开火。

original:
--------------
§GDo not engage§! will work only if:
 - Fleet has no orders
 - Fleet is patrolling
"Do not engage" will auto-enable when fleet has been defeated and running to the home base to be repaired.
translation:
--------------
§G避免交战§!只有在如下情况下才能工作：
 - 舰队没有命令
 - 舰队正在巡逻
"避免交战"在舰队被击败后撤回基地修理的途中会自动激活。

original: The fleet engagement rule is to §GDo not engage§! the enemies.
translation: 舰队交战规定是§G避免交战§!。

original: §ROur fleet does not have access to this region§!
translation: §R我们的舰队无法到达这个区域§!

original: §GClick§! to assign the fleets to that §YInvasion§!.
translation: §G点击§!将舰队分配给§Y登陆§!行动。

original: Move the mouse over the §YInvasion§! arrow, and §GClick§! to assign the fleets to it.\nIf you did not painted the invasion order yet, you can do it by selecting the §YArmy§! and use the §GNaval Invasion Order§! tool.
translation: 将鼠标移动到§Y登陆§!箭头上，§G点击§!分配舰队。\n如果你还没有设置登陆命令，你可以通过选择§Y集团军§!并使用§G登陆作战§!工具。

original: §GCtrl+Right-click§! to cancel mission, and move to location.
translation: §GCtrl+右键点击§!取消任务并移动到指定位置。

original: \n§HThere is no missions set in this region.§!

How spread out this fleet is. A more spread out fleet will cover more area which helps to locate the enemy, but will take time to assemble for a larger battle when required. Spread is mainly affected by what mission you have selected.
translation: 这支舰队阵型展开的程度。 一支展开更广的舰队能覆盖更大的区域，便于发现敌人，但在需要进行更大的战斗时会花费更多的时间来集中。展开程度主要受到你选择的任务的影响。

original: There is no sea provinces in this region.
The base this fleet is carrying out missions from.\n§YCTRL§!+§GRight-click§! a naval base to move and set a new §Ghome base§!.
translation: 这支舰队出发执行任务的港口。\n§YCTRL§!+§G右键点击§!一个海军基地以前往并设置新的§G母港§!。

original: §RMaximum mission region count reached for all selected units§!
translation: §R所有选中单位都到达了最大任务海域限制§!

original: §RUnits that reached their maximum mission region count already:§!
translation: §R到达最大任务海域限制的单位：§!

original: Non-moving fleets on §Yhold§! in coastal areas can block straits, but they can be spotted by divisions. Does not apply to fleets containing only §Ysubmarines§!.
translation: 在沿海海域§Y待机§!不动的舰队可以封锁海峡，不过他们会被陆军单位发现。完全由§Y潜艇§!组成的舰队没有此效果。

original: §GRight-click§! to move to that naval base.\n§YCTRL§!+§GRight-click§! to set as §Ghome base§!.
translation: §G右键点击§!向目标海军基地移动。\n§YCTRL§!+§G右键点击§!将其设置为§G母港§!。

original: §GClick§! to select fleets with this §Ghome base§!.
translation: §G点击§!选择这里作为舰队的§G母港§!。

original: Toggle mode between direct movement control and giving missions in areas
translation: 在直接下达移动命令或给予地区任务之间切换模式

original: To create a new fleet you need at least two ships in one fleet.
translation: 至少需要两艘船只来建立一只新的舰队。

original: To create new fleet should not be in combat.

translation: 来自当前最大值的基础增长：§Y$VALUE|%1$§!

original: Can only repair when in a naval base.
translation: 只能在海军基地中维修。

original: Repair is estimated to be finished at $WHEN|Y$.
With $SHIPS|Y$ ships needing repair, each regain $REPAIR|+G%$ each hour.
translation: 共有$SHIPS|Y$艘船需要维修，每艘每小时将获得$REPAIR|+G%$。

original: This naval base has a level of $SIZE|Y0$, of which $FUNCTIONAL|Y0$ are functional, each level providing $EFFECT|Y$ strength repair maximum, with $USED|Y0$ ship off a $CAPACITY|Y0$ capacity in the base and local supply level of $SUPPLY|Y%$, the total hourly maximum repair power is $POWER|Y2%$.\n
translation: 这个海军基地的等级为$SIZE|Y0$，可用等级为$FUNCTIONAL|Y0$，每个等级将提供$EFFECT|Y$%最大维修能力，共有$USED|Y0$艘船只占用基地内总数为$CAPACITY|Y0$的容量，外加$SUPPLY|Y%$的地区补给等级，每小时最大维修总数为$POWER|Y2%$。\n

original: Strength represents how much damage a ship can take before being destroyed
translation: 强度代表了一艘船能够在沉没前承受多少伤害

original:
====================
$NUM|G$ of $MOD|Y$ from $FROM|Y$
$DEAD|R$ shot down by the enemy.
\n====================\n$HOUR|Y$ hours ago $NUM|G$ of $MOD|Y$ came from $FROM|Y$. $DEAD|R$ was shot down by the enemy.
translation: \n====================\n$HOUR|Y$小时前$NUM|G$架$MOD|Y$($FROM|Y$方面)。被敌军击落$DEAD|R$架。

original: §gShips may receive critical hits that are way stronger than usual hits. Mainly because of exploded ammo storage or fuel tanks.\nIncreasing the ship reliability will reduce the chance that received hit becomes critical.\nThe highest critical chance is done by torpedoes.§!
translation: §g由于弹药或者油箱爆炸，船只或许会受到暴击伤害\n增加船只的耐久度可以减少受到暴击几率。\n暴击几率最高的武器为鱼雷。§!

original: §RYou can't transfer ships between fleets in different naval bases§!
translation: §R你不能让部署在不同海军基地的舰队调配船只§!

original: No evacuation air base found - its aircrafts have been lost.
translation: 未找到撤退的空军基地 - 所有飞机全部被摧毁。

original: Its aircrafts have been evacuated to the airbase in $STATE|Y$ in $COUNTRY|Y$.
translation: 飞机已被撤离到位于$STATE|Y$$COUNTRY|Y$的基地。

original: We have air units in this region, but they are not actively performing their missions currently.
translation: 我们在这片地区内有可用飞机，但他们目前并未执行任务。

original: There are currently no air units active in this region.
translation: 我们在这片地区内没有可用的飞机。

original: With current amount of aircraft we can effectively cover $WE_COVERAGE|%0Y$ of region.
translation: 以当前的飞机数量我们可以覆盖$WE_COVERAGE|%0Y$的地区。

original: Each type of an air wing has a defined superiority power value, that describes how effective it is in domination on the sky. The superiority power in the region comes from all of your (and your allies) active air wings in that region. The more air wings the higher value, but be aware that the value is also reduced with low region coverage. So remember to rebase your air wings to get the most optimal region coverage.
translation: 每种飞机都有一个空优值，这个值代表这种飞机夺取制空权的能力。空域的制空权是你（与你的盟友）在该空域所有出动的飞机的空优数值和。飞机数量越多、飞机空优值越高，区域制空权越高。这个数值会因为低地区覆盖率而减少，所以请记得把你的飞机转场到最能有效覆盖该区域的机场。

original: Reduced by the enemy anti air in region = $RED|R1$
translation: 因敌方区域内防空而减少 = $RED|R1$

original: Reduced by our anti air in region = $RED|G1$
translation: 因我方区域内防空而减少 = $RED|G1$

original: There are friendly fighters active in the area
translation: 区域内有执行任务的友方战斗机

original: There are friendly bombers active in the area
translation: 区域内有执行任务的友方轰炸机

original: There are friendly support planes active in the area
translation: 区域内有执行任务的友方支援机

original: There are friendly anti air guns active in the area
translation: 区域内有执行任务的友方防空炮
敌方当前投入的战斗机
敌方当前投入的轰炸机
敌方当前投入的辅助机
x 海域覆盖：$COV|1%+$ (§Y$FOR$§! 阵型展开度：$NAME$)

original: \n If we have better decryption than an enemy vessels encryption we get $VAL|G0%$ improved detection per level.
translation: \n 如果我们拥有比敌舰编码器更为优秀的解码能力，我们将额外获得每级$VAL|G0%$的探测能力。

original: §gTrue detection chance also depends on enemy ships visibility.§!
translation: §g实际探测几率还取决于敌军舰艇的能见度。§!

original: §GClick to grab this group of ships and drop it on another fleet.\n§!
translation: §G点击选择这些舰船并将它们编入其他舰队。\n§!

original: §GRight-Click to create new fleet from this group.§!
translation: §G右键点击这些舰船创造一支新的舰队。§!

original: §RCannot assign to new fleet while in combat.§!
Click to select this Army, and draw orders for them.
translation: 点击选择这支部队并给他们发出命令。

original: Click to §Runassign§! all currently selected units from this army.
translation: 点击§R分离§!这支部队的所有单位。

original: Click to §Runassign§! this unit from the command army.
Click to stop the §Rexercise§! with this army.
Click to §RRemove§! this army. All its divisions will become unassigned.
translation: 点击§R解散§!这个集团军。它下属的师将全部变为未分配状态。

original: §GClick§! to $ACTION$ the execution of the §Yentire plan.§!\n§GShift + Click§! and then §Yclick on the desired order§! to Toggle execution\n§GCtrl + Click§! to toggle execution of all assigned divisions and armies
translation: §G点击§!$ACTION$执行§Y全部命令。§!\n§GShift+点击§!后再次§Y点击所需的命令§!可以切换执行的命令。\n§GCtrl+点击§!可以切换所有分配的陆军师和集团军执行的命令

original: This army has no orders to execute. You need to create a plan to enable this.
translation: 这支部队没有命令可执行。你需要创建一个计划以便执行。

original: Now click on the map on the desired orders to toggle their execution.
translation: 现在点击地图上所需的命令以切换执行的计划。

original: §HDelete Order§!\n§GClick§! this button, then click on the order on the map you want to delete.\n§GRight-click§! this button, to §Rdelete all orders§! of currently selected army.
translation: §H移除指令§!\n§G点击§!这个按钮，然后再点击地图上你想删除的指令。\n§G右键点击§!这个按钮以对该部队§R移除全部指令§! 。

original:
§HEdit mode§!
Hit this button to toggle the mode, or hold §GALT§!
§GRight-click§! on battle plans ending pins to edit them.
§GClick and hold the mouse button§! on the Advancement Arrow to reshape it or connect with another order.
§GRight-click and hold the mouse button§! on one of the blinking orders to begin painting a new Advancement Arrow.
translation:
§H编辑模式§!
点击该按钮以切换模式，或者按住 §GALT§!
§G右键点击§!战争计划以编辑。
§G点击并按住§!推进箭头以重开或与其他指令连接。
§G右键点击并按住§!一个闪烁的指令以绘制一个新的推进箭头。

original:
§HOffensive line§!
§GRight-click and hold the mouse button§! on the map to draw §YOffensive Line§!.
Lines can be painted only on territory you have assigned a §HFront Line§! or §HNaval Invasion§! to.

Divisions assigned to a plan with an Offensive Line will try to take territory to move their front line there. 

§GHold mouse button§! and §Grelease§! it on an execute behavior button to change plan's execution type
translation:
§H进攻线§!
§G右键点击并按住§!在地图上绘制§Y进攻线§!。
进攻线只能在你已经视作§H前线§!或§H海军入侵区§!的地区绘制。

将单位分配给一个带有进攻线的计划会努力攻占地区并将他们的前线推进到那里。

§G按住鼠标§!之后在执行方针按钮上§G松开§!可以改变命令执行类型

original:
§HFront Line§!
 - §GClick§! on one of the borders against another country to set the assigned front along entire border.
 - §GRight-click and drag the mouse§! on one of the borders against another country to set the front in a shorter interval.
 - §GRight-click and drag the mouse§! on the existing frontline endings to edit them.

Front lines are the start point of attacks into enemy territory towards Offensive Lines, but also allows you to quickly position Divisions along a foreign border.
translation:
§H前线§!
 - §G点击§!一条与其他国家接壤的边界可将整个边界全部设置为前线。
 - §G右键点击并拖动鼠标§!在与其他国家接壤的边界上可将边界的一部分设置为前线。
 - §G右键点击并拖动§!已有前线的终点可以进行编辑。

前线是向着进攻线入侵敌军区域的起始点，另外还可以帮助你在国境线上快速部署单位。

original:
§HFront Line§!
 - §GClick§! on one of the borders against another country to set the assigned front along entire border.
 - §GShift + Click§! on one of the borders against another country to set the assigned front without sub-army fronts along entire border.
 - §GRight-click and drag the mouse§! on one of the borders against another country to set the front in a shorter interval.
 - §GShift + Right-click and drag the mouse§! on one of the borders against another country to set the front without sub-army fronts in a shorter interval.
 - §GRight-click and drag the mouse§! on the existing frontline endings to edit them.

Front lines are the start point of attacks into enemy territory towards Offensive Lines, but also allows you to quickly position Divisions along a foreign border.
translation:
§H前线§!
 - §G点击§!一条与其他国家接壤的边界可将整个边界全部设置为前线。
 - §GShift+点击§!一条与其他国家接壤的边界可将整个边界全部设置为前线，同时不影响下属集团军的前线。
 - §G右键点击并拖动鼠标§!在与其他国家接壤的边界上可将边界的一部分设置为前线。
 - §GShift+右键点击并拖动鼠标§!在与其他国家接壤的边界上可将边界的一部分设置为前线，同时不影响下属集团军的前线。
 - §G右键点击并拖动§!已有前线的终点可以进行编辑。

前线是向着进攻线入侵敌军区域的起始点，另外还可以帮助你在国境线上快速部署单位。

original:
§HFallback line§!
 - §GRight-click and drag the mouse§! on the friendly territory to draw the §YSingle use§! defensive order.

Fallback lines are useful for positioning Divisions for defence, for example, behind a river, or somewhere else in friendly territory.
translation:
§H防御线§!
 - §G右键点击并拖动鼠标§!在友方地区以绘制§Y仅用于§!防御的命令。

防御线便于部署防御单位，比如说在河流的对岸或其他友好区域。

original:
§HGarrison Area§!
 - §GClick§! on states to add/remove them from the army's order.
An Army with this order cannot have other types at the same time.

Divisions assigned to an Army with this order will spread out over the assigned area to guard important cities, ports or other objects as well as handle local Resistance and minor enemy presence.
translation:
§H守备区§!
 - §G点击§!该地区以从指令中添加或移除他们。
拥有这个指令的部队同时无法拥有其他类型。

一个单位分配给拥有这个指令的部队后将分散在这个地区并防御重要的城市、港口或其他目标，同时处理当地抵抗力量或次要的敌军。

original:
§HNaval Invasion Order§!
Step 1) §GClick§! on one of the highlighted provinces to set the invasion source.
Step 2) §GRight-click§! on the desired coast province(s) to invade.
Once the plan is activated, the invasion will begin to prepare and reserve convoys from your countries pool.
translation:
§H海军入侵指令§!
第一步、 §G点击§!一个高亮省份以设置出发点。
第二步、 §G右键点击§!需要的海岸省份以入侵。
一旦计划激活，入侵行动将开始从国库中自行生产并储备护航舰队。

original:
§HParatroop Order§!
Step 1) §GClick§! on our air base to designate the takeoff point. The air base must have available transport planes.
Step 2) §GRight-click§! on the province that is in range of the local transport planes, to designate the drop location.
§gRemember that only the units with paratroop ability will be transported.§!
translation:
§H伞兵指令§!
第一步、 §G点击§!我方的空军基地以设置起飞点。该空军基地必须拥有足够的运输机。
第二步、 §G右键点击§!当地运输机航程内的省份以确定降落点。
§g请记住仅有携带伞兵装备的单位可以登上运输机。§!

original: §RYou have to create a Front line first.§!

translation: §R无法分离执行§Y驻防§!命令的单位。§!

original: §HDivisions assignment mode§!\nHit this button to toggle the mode, or hold §GCTRL§!.\nThen select one of the highlighted fronts to assign the currently selected units.
translation: §H师分配模式§!\n点击该图标或按住§GCTRL§!可以切换模式。\n然后选择一个高亮的前线以分配这些单位。

original: §HUnassign divisions§!\nHit this button to unassign the currently selected divisions from their orders.
translation: §H解除师任务§!\n点击该图标可以解除选中单位的任务。

original: §RDivision belongs to an army, but has no orders assigned!§!\nDraw Defensive/Offensive Lines and assign units to them.
translation: §R师已加入部队，但并未分配指令!§!\n设计出进攻线或防御线并分配单位给它们。

original: §RDivision belongs to an army with no orders, it will use army group order instead.§!
translation: §R师所属的集团军没有设定命令，它将执行集团军群的命令。§!

original: §RUnits are unwilling or unable to execute assigned order!§!\nUnits are not allowed to enter demilitarized zones and will not carry out suicidal battle plans without specific movement orders.
translation: §R单位不愿意或者无法执行已分配的指令!§!\n单位未被允许进入非军事区，在没有明确指令的前提下无法执行自杀性战斗计划。

original: §RUnit unable to move to a province along its path§!
translation: §R单位无法通过该路经移动到该省份§!

original: §RUnable to find valid path to target§!
translation: §R无法找到通往目标的有效路径§!

original: §RUnable to move to next target province§!
translation: §R无法移动至下一个目标省份§!

original: §RIf unit were to continue moving it would cause the next province to require more supplies than it has capacity for.\nExplicit move order can force the unit to move it out anyway§!
translation: §R如果单位继续移动，将导致下一个省份需要提供超出其自身能力的补给。\n确认移动命令将强制单位执行。§!

original: §RUnit considers attacking to be too dangerous.\nExplicit move order can force the unit to carry it out anyway.§!
translation: §R单位发动进攻过于危险。\n确认移动命令将强制单位执行。§!

original: §RUnable to find a valid attack target§!
§YUnit has carried out its orders and is awaiting new ones§!
translation: §Y单位已执行完全部命令并在等待新的命令§!

original: §YUnit is unable to carry out its orders.§!
§RUnit's organization is too low to advance.§!\nPlease wait for them to reorganize, or consider changing the §YAggressiveness§! of the battleplans execution.
translation: §R单位组织度过低，无法前进。§!\n请等待他们组织度恢复，或者考虑改变战斗计划的§Y攻击性§!。

original: §RUnit will not move into demilitarized zone§!
translation: §R单位无法移动至非军事地区§!

original: §GClick§! to toggle execution of this order.
§RThis order belongs to a different army.§!
Please move the mouse pointer over one of the orders that you wish to toggle execution.
translation: 请将鼠标移动至你想切换执行的命令上。

original: §TFilter by if a nation is considered a Major or not.§!
translation: §T根据一个国家是否被视作一个主要国家来过滤。§!

original: This air base is a §HFleet§! containing §HAircraft Carriers§!.\n§gClick to select§!
translation: 该空军基地是一个包含§H航空母舰§!的§H舰队§! 。\n§g点击选择§!

original: At this popularity, effects are scaled to $SCALE|Y2%$
translation: 根据当前支持率，效果已经降低到 $SCALE|Y2%$

original: Having a Commander assigned to an Army boosts the Army in various areas depending on the Commander's skill.
translation: 为部队分配指挥官将视指挥官的不同技能对部队有各方面的增强。

original: $NAME$ is currently leading $CURRENT|Y$ divisions, and is capable of efficiently leading $MAX|Y$ divisions.
translation: $NAME$当前指挥着$CURRENT|Y$个师，可以有效指挥至多$MAX|Y$个师。

original: $NAME$ is currently leading $CURRENT|Y$ armies, and is capable of efficiently leading $MAX|Y$ armies.
translation: $NAME$可以有效指挥个集团军，$MAX|Y$当前指挥着$CURRENT|Y$个集团军。

original: $NAME$ is a Field Marshal and has no command limit.
translation: $NAME$是一位元帅因此没有指挥上限。

original: At the cost of one skill level this leader is promoted to the next rank
translation: 消耗一个技能等级以提升指挥官军衔。

original: This leader is not skilled enough to promote
translation: 该指挥官没有足够的技能等级故无法提升

original: This leader has the highest available rank
translation: 该指挥官已提升至最高军衔

original: §RNaval Commander can be changed only in ports§!
translation: §R仅在港口内可更换海军指挥官§!

original: Stage coup not available in MP.
translation: 多人模式无法发动政变。

original: There is no gain of organization while in combat.
translation: 陆战中无法获得组织度。

original: There is no gain of organization during naval invasion.
translation: 登陆中无法获得组织度。

original: Organization is over the supply soft-cap of $CAP|Y$, Organization will be reduced by $LOSS|R$ each hour.
translation: 组织度已经超过补给峰值$CAP|Y$，组织度将每小时降低$LOSS|R$。

original: $SPY|H$ is attempting to Acquire Intel in $TARGET|Y$.
The spy focuses on gathering intel on the nation. Will find military troops you will not otherwise have seen
translation: 这个间谍的重点是收集该国家的情报，这样你就有机会看到原本不可见的军队

original: $SPY|H$ is attempting to Boost Party Popularity ($PARTY|Y$) in $TARGET|Y$.
Boosts a particular political group in the nation which means that they could win during elections or make a future coup more powerful
translation: 在该国提高特定政治组织的影响以使他们在未来的选举中获胜或使将来的颠覆行动更为强大。

original: $SPY|H$ is attempting a coup in $TARGET|Y$.\nHas done $PROGRESS|G%1$ of coup preparation.
translation: $SPY|H$正试图颠覆$TARGET|Y$。\n已经做好了$PROGRESS|G%1$发动政变的准备。

original: The spy remains on standby until a new mission is assigned.
translation: 间谍正在待命，直到有新的任务。

original: Prepare a coup attempt against the target nation. When done it will trigger a civil war. Strength of the uprising will depend on the nation's national unity and the political popularity of your ideology
translation: 准备对目标国家发动政变，完成后目标国家将会发生内战.内战强度将取决于该国家的民族团结和你的意识形态的影响。

original: §gCommanding too many ships may lead to chaos in the formations - it will take much more time for ships to come into the battle.\nAlso all positive Commander Traits and Skills modifiers will be reduced.§!
translation: §g指挥过多的船只进行战斗可能导致阵型混乱-这会导致舰船需要更多的时间来准备战斗。\n此外一切指挥官正面特长和技能加成都会受到影响。§!

original: Commanding too many divisions will reduce all positive Commander Trait and Skill modifiers.
translation: 指挥过多的部队会导致指挥官的特长和技能的加成遭到削弱。

original: Commanding too many armies will reduce all positive Commander Trait and Skill modifiers.
translation: 指挥过多的集团军会导致指挥官的特长和技能的加成遭到削弱。
可以有效指挥$MAX|Y$个集团军。

original: This Commander can handle $MAX|Y$ divisions, and is currently commanding $DIV|Y$.
translation: 该指指挥官可以有效指挥$MAX|Y$个师，当前指挥着$DIV|Y$个师。
该指挥官能够指挥$MAX|Y$条舰船。

original: This Commander can handle $MAX|Y$ ships, and is currently in command of $SHIP|Y$ ships.
translation: 该指指挥官可以有效指挥$MAX|Y$条舰船，当前指挥着$SHIP|Y$条舰船。

original: Unit without a Commander can handle up to $MAX|Y$ ships. Currently $SHIP|Y$ ships.
translation: 没有指挥官的单位可以有效指挥$MAX|Y$条舰船。当前指挥着$SHIP|Y$条舰船。
先前的任务取消 (准备就绪 $DATE$)。

original: \n---------------\nResistance daily growth: $TOT|%2-=$ ( Capped at $SUPPRESSION|Y%2$ from suppression )
translation: \n---------------\n抵抗每日增长：$TOT|%2-=$ (由于镇压，上限 $SUPPRESSION|Y%2$ )

original: §gResistance can grow only in fully occupied non-core states.§!
translation: §g只有在完全被占领的非核心地区抵抗才会增长。§!

original:
§GClick§! to select division.
§GShift+Click§! to toggle selection.
§GDouble-click§! to select all divisions with the same template
§GRight-Click§! to pan to the Division
translation:
§G点击§!选中该师。
§GShift+点击§!切换选择。
§G双击§!选中该编制的全部陆军师
§G右键点击§!移动镜头至该师

original: §GRight-Click§! to pan to the Fleet (or a Port)
translation: §G右键点击§!移动镜头到舰队(或港口)

original: Next nuclear bomb is $PROGRESS|1G%$ done will be ready roughly in $DAYS|G$ days.
translation: 下一颗核弹已经完成了$PROGRESS|1G%$，大约将在 $DAYS|G$后完成。

original: Currently we are not producing any nuclear bombs.
translation: 目前我们没有在生产任何核弹。

original: Increase amount of ships left to produce.\n§GCtrl+Click to add §H10§!\n§GShift+Click to add §H100§!
translation: 增加计划生产的船只的数量。\n§GCtrl+点击可以增加§H10§!条\n§GShift+点击可以增加§H100§!条

original: Amount of ships left to produce.
translation: 计划生产的船只的数量。

original: Decrease amount of ships left to produce.\n§GCtrl+Click to deduct §H10§!\n§GShift+Click to deduct §H100§!
translation: 减少计划生产的船只的数量。\n§GCtrl+点击可以减少§H10§!条\n§GShift+点击可以减少§H100§!条

original: Oil is important for making any form of vehicle run.
translation: 石油对制造任何形式车辆非常重要。

original: Aluminum is important for the construction of specialized vehicles and aircraft.
translation: 铝对制造特种车辆和飞机非常重要。

original: Rubber is important for the construction of most vehicles.
translation: 橡胶对建造大部分车辆非常重要。

original: Tungsten is a rare hard metal mainly used for anti-tank munitions, but also machine tools and specialized parts.
translation: 钨是一种稀有的硬质金属，主要用于反坦克弹药，也可用于机床和一些特殊零件。

original: Steel is the primary metal for most types of military machinery, whether it be tanks or ships.
translation: 钢是大多数军用机械的主要材料，无论是坦克还是船。

original: Chromium is a metal used for the construction of advanced engines.
translation: 铬是一种用于制造先进发动机的金属。

original: Countries with claims on this state.
translation: 对这个地区有宣称的国家。

original:
This node could support more supplies, but is limited by some §R'bottlenecks'§! in its route.
Consider improving §Ginfrastructure§! along the route.
Improve also the naval bases if the route includes the sea path.
Think then about necessary amount of convoys and escorts.
translation:
此节点可以支持更多的补给，但它受到了补给线路中§R'瓶颈'§!的限制。
建议改善沿线的§G基础设施§!。
如果路线包含海路，还需要加强海军基地。
注意分配足够的运输船和护卫力量。

original: This node supports enough supplies so far.\nThink that the usage will raise as more troops are in the area.
translation: 目前为止这个节点提供了足够的补给。\n如果区域内存在更多的部队，消耗也会增加。

original: Average Infrastructure of states in the area ($AVG|1Y$) will increase how much supply can go through it.\nThe total level of §Yinfrastructure§! in the area is $LVL|G$.
translation: 在该区域各个地区的平均基建（$AVG|1Y$）会影响多少补给可以通过。\n在该区域的§Y基础设施§!总体等级为$LVL|G$。

original: \n§GWe are already improving §Yinfrastructure§! in this area.§!
translation: \n§G我们正在提高该区域的§Y基础设施§!。§!
最高级别的§Y海军基地§!是$LVL|G$。

original: \n§GWe are already improving the local best §Ynaval base§!.§!
translation: \n§G我们正在扩建当地最好的§Y海军基地§!。§!
有单位空降并受到损失

original: How many £victory_points  §HVictory Point(s)§! this province is worth.
translation: 这个省份价值多少 £victory_points §H胜利点§!。

original: Assigned to the wing of $NUM|H$x $UNIT|H$ in $LOC|H$
Choose the Ace to assign to $UNIT|H$ in $LOC|H$
translation: 选择要分配到位于$LOC|H$的$UNIT|H$联队的王牌

original: There are no Ace Pilots in our country yet. Pilots may be promoted after doing successful missions.
translation: 在我们国家没有王牌飞行员。飞行员通过多执行一些成功任务就会有了。

translation: 不能分配王牌飞行员，因为§R已阵亡§!。

original: Formation spread is how much the fleet has spread out over the mission area. The more the ships are spread out, the higher chance they have to spot the enemy, but fewer ships will be able enter combat initially.
translation: 阵型展开度是舰队在任务区域的分散程度。舰队越分散，发现敌人的机会越高，但同时进入战斗的战舰越少。

original: \nThey will come and merge back with the fleet they are detached from.
translation: \n他们会赶来并回归之前离开的舰队。

original: \n§RBeware§! that $FLEET|H$ may send those ships back, unless you change the repair policy to §RNever repair§!.
translation: \n§R注意§!$FLEET|H$可能还是会把这些舰队派回来，除非你把修复政策变为§R从不修理§!。

original: §RNever repair.§!\nThe fleet will never decide to return to the home base on its own.
translation: §R从不修理。§!\n舰队不会主动回到海军基地。

original: §RRepair priority - Low.§!\nThe fleet will decide to return to the home base on its own, when the ships will suffer §RSevere§! damage.
translation: §R修理优先级 - 低。§!\n当舰队受到§R严重§!损伤，舰队会主动回到海军基地。

original: §YRepair priority - Medium.§!\nThe fleet will decide to return to the home base on its own, when the ships will suffer §YAverage§! damage.
translation: §Y修理优先级 - 中。§!\n当舰队受到§Y中等§!损伤，舰队会主动回到海军基地。

original: §GRepair priority - High.§!\nThe fleet will decide to return to the home base on its own, when the ships will suffer §GMild§! damage.
translation: §G修理优先级 - 高。§!\n当舰队受到§G轻微§!损伤，舰队会主动回到海军基地。

original: The repair-and-return system allows sending damaged ships home for repairs, without player action. The priority setting lets the player to choose what is more important...\nCarry on the mission at any cost?\nOr, survive at any cost?
translation: 自动分离系统可以在没有玩家操作的情况下自动命令受损船只返回基地修理。优先级设定可以让玩家选择什么才是更重要的……\n是不惜一切代价完成任务？\n还是，不顾一切地保证活下去？

original: Allow to split option makes the most damaged ships to split off on its own and return to the home base for repairs, while the main fleet is still doing its current task. The risk is, that the detached ships can be attacked on its way home. When the detached ships are fully repaired, they will return to the main fleet and merge back.\nNotice that the amount of ships to split off depends on the priority settings, as well as the severity of a single ship damage.
translation: 允许大受损最严重船只自行离队并回到基地修理，主舰队仍执行当前的任务。船只在回基地的路上可能会遭到袭击。当离队船只完全修复，他们将返回到主舰队。\n注意，受损离队的船只数量取决于优先级设置，以及船的受损程度。

original:
